page.title: 15Animals in Plympton St.Mary.
page.content: Apart from the usual pets,farmers in the area have a good variety of animals. The main breed of cattle seems to be {Friesians}herded at Ford,Battisford, Lwr.Venton,Smithaleigh,Hitchcombe and Challonsleigh,although Langage keep {Jersey}cattle for their high cream content.Collarford keep{S.Devon}and Challonsleigh{Charolais}for beef.A small herd of{sheep}is kept at Ford and Collarford. { Turkeys,Geese and chickens}are kept at Ley and Hitchcombe for free range eggs and the Christmas table. Among the unusual animals are a{Red {Breasted Red Black Ginger Cockerel}at Collarford and an{Oxford Black and Tan pig at Smithaleigh Children's Farm.
